author: Doug Bostrom
content:
It’s quite amazing how the firm appears to have gone to to heroic lengths in downplaying the fact that gambling will take place on a ship. The Tropical Breeze Casino website sports not a single picture of a vessel of any kind.

All business. Let’s focus on fleecing.
